title: TB is TB
body:
anyone else notice  when you play team builder it is tuberculosis levels of anti-fun?

I mean... it is blind pick, you have no way of stopping or countering any super cheese the enemy concocts, which they most definitely WILL.

yes it lets you do these cheesy things, but what is the point when the enemy team is equally toxic  to play against?

I know it is supposed to be so you can make a game plan and prepare before matches... but is it worth it when you know you're going to fight the most OP, unbannable enemies?

I can't say i've EVER had a single pleasant TB game in my entire LoL history.... maybe i'm just NaCl, but this game mode is almost as anti-fun as fighting ARAM accounts when you draw a bad champ.... but that is for a different time...

does anyone actually ENJOY team builder...? I don't, and I keep trying to give it a fair chance.... but it is always pure ebolatitis C with a side of HIV.....
